Conversation.line: Why does the Coalition not have any special forces unlike the Separatists?
No idea, probably because they don't need them.
You'd think a PMC would have formed by now and filled that niche?
Given how hellish the political situation is I can sort of see that being a market that's going to skyrocket soon, trained contractors for better security when shit hits the fan.
I suppose time will tell, if we have that much time left until this all sparks into hell on Europa.
Newsflash they do have Spec Ops, heard of the Marauders and Protectorates?
Really? I've never heard of those guys.
The Coalition likes to keep their doings quiet, in the interest of not getting my ass sacked I won't say anything.
You lot heard of Vanguard Operators?
Who hasn't? They're the go-to for the Separatist's outpost raids, laying waste to basically everyone who dares stand in their way
I really hope to Jove we don't end up finding any, last thing I want is to end up as one of their war trophies and as another statistic to the Separatists.
Well you've just jinxed us now so well done.
No I haven't, who are they?
They're Separatist Special Forces, they kick ass and take names on Coalition outposts, they're also given some pretty serious gear and funding to work with.
Damn I hope we aren't on the receiving end of them then.
Agreed, but for now it's best we don't worry about it, we've got other shit that needs contending with.
Got some pretty snazzy helmets don't they?
They do, though I'm not really sure why they made them look like wolves, pretty weird I'll not lie.

I remember reading a book on ancient Earth history, a lot of tribes and even more civilised communities a few thousand years ago used animals to show aggression or, really any form of emotion or strength.
Still really weird nontheless no?.
Preso Latex is a horrible creation, who thought it was a good idea?
I'll have you know it's pretty useful for refining into ammunition, which you jarheads seem to go through a lot.
No need to be a dick about it.
I'll be as dickish as I want to.
Hey I'm the one who keeps assholes out of our sub and makes sure no one backstabs your ass, how about you be slightly more grateful?
And I'm the one who has to plug the holes that are made when you fucking fail at that.
The both of you PLEASE SHUT THE FUCK UP! I can't do shit when all I can hear is you two yabbing away in my headphones.
If we've got any on board keep it in Containment Boxes, that stuff is a bitch to keep safe.
We got CBRN suits in case someone goes renegade and tries to kill us all with it?
Don't know, I'll check real quick.
Eugh, I don't really know, all I know is it's useful for ammo.
It's some pretty weird shit I'll not lie, given how dangerous it is I don't know why we haven't chosen something better.
If it ain't broke don't fix it I guess, it might as well be the backbone of the ammo industry right now.
From what I understand it's a semi-decent way of making use of all the Elastin out here, mix it with the right things and you've got an emulsive polymer that can be used in the production of stuff.
That'd be nice if it's main purpose wasn't chemical weapons.
I dunno, Ignis Latex has been used to process Magnesium and Flashpowder in bulk, probably why there's so much ammo lying around these days.
I really don't like how war-like the situation is with the Separatists and Coalition...
Well yeah it's been like that for years.
I heard a security team was clearing a suspected Separatist hideout, turns out it was booby trapped and all 4 of the team were killed.
I also heard about a chemical weapons attack on a station, no idea who started it but most of the people on it were dead or seriously injured.
What chemical was it?
I think Ignis Latex though there was reports that the victim's skin sort of... boiled away underneath, nothing left but a bloody mess.
Holy shit.
Well they are ideologically opposed, religion and politics back on Earth were arguably the number one reasons for war.
Opposition causes conflict, that naturally tends to favour getting rid of the opposition.
Fingers crossed we don't have this turn into a total war then.
Given how things are going right now, I seriously doubt crossing your fingers will do anything.
You guys heard of this really weird urban legend of a weird looking mask driving people crazy and killing them?
I'd like to say I haven't, I really hope that's just some methhead clown story.
As mad as clowns seem to be especially with all the crap going on as of recent I dunno, for some reason this legend just... hits different.
Well, like with any legend I doubt we'll find any proof for it.
Eh, I wouldn't believe any of that crap, Europa's a dark place and people tend to see things that aren't there, especially in those creepy as all hell ruins.
It's natural, don't get worked up over it.
If you say so Doc'.
Oh Jove you're talking about THAT? Fuck no talk about something else that shit is horrible!
Calm down, Jesus I wasn't expecting someone to go crazy just by me asking that, fucking hell.
Then for everyone's sakes don't say anything about it.
Can't wait to get my hands on an Anti-Materiel Rifle, shit can punch through any wearable armour and mess up sub hulls.
I have a feeling that would be incredibly expensive to maintain, .50 BMG isn't cheap you know.
Screw price, I just want to put a big ass hole into something.
I'm sure security isn't concerned at all.
Bro you've got the aim of a fucking stormtrooper, I swear you'd be more of a danger to us with one than an actual enemy.
Oh as if you're any better, look who's talking...
Uh uh, at least I don't talk about it.
Dude I was just saying I want one, no one said anything about my aim until you brought it up, you're such a buzzkill.
Any of you wondered why the sub mounted Machine Gun turret's only in 7.62mm?
Not really sure, you'd think they'd go for something a bit beefier? There's a lot of ammo in the boxes but they aren't the most effective option.
That and coilguns are a thing so it's a pretty niche option to begin with.
I suppose that makes sense.
It's meant to be a really cheap, power efficient means of slinging lead at things, I suppose they chose 7.62 because it's a lot easier to bulk manufacture.
Now granted a .50 cal would be amazingly cool and make it more viable, Coilguns are kinda everywhere now and MG turrets are sorta legacy options.
Imagine a 5.56 Sub Machine Turret, that'd be pretty useless.
That'd be only good against those small ass fish I sometimes see out of the window, though I guess they could be alright for interior security.
The mask is here, it's coming for us all...
... The fuck? the hell is that supposed to mean?
Oh you'll never understand.
Of course I bloody won't if you don't explain it what the hell do you mean by 'The Mask'? Have you finally lost it?
Do you need some Haloperidol? You're freaking everyone out with your weird sayings.
You'll never understand what I have seen.
Mhm, maybe that's for the best given your medical record.
... What?
You'll never understand what I have seen.
I don't think I really want to if I'm honest...
Who brought Joe Biden from the dead?
What the Jove kind of reference is that? Hasn't he been dead for like over 400 years?
Apparently not, his dementia ridden ass is here to haunt us, just to make this place slightly more intolerable.
Anyone seen those Vanguards? Damn fine suits if I say...
... What? You're not hinting at what I think you are, are you?
Oh you and me both know.
Lay off the Ethanol you pervert...
Your imagination must be one hell of a thing, those suits show absolutely nothing aside from 'you're screwed'.
Oh I definitely know one of us is screwed if you get my drift.
Good Jove almighty you need to chill out...
I think you need some anti-psy pills, you've been acting... weird lately.
Hey I'm not one to complain about some good ass.
You won't have one yourself if security decides they're tired of your weirdness.
Fuck off you furry.
Jealous much?
Seriously piss off, I have little to no patience for people like you.
Any of you heard about that weird epidemic of Lineavirus on a submarine a few days ago?
Sounds like medical got a bit experimental...
Apparently not, they found a weird green looking artefact and the whole crew only hours later started falling ill, it apparently smells like a rotting corpse.
Not entirely sure why the aliens needed such a thing but... can we please not have one on board? I'd like to keep my lungs and stomach.
That disease is starting to prop up a lot recently, I have no idea why.
Maybe it's something to do with the Separatists or the Husk Cultists?
I dunno that's a bit of a far stretch, you'd think the Coalition would take that ball and run with it.
As if they're sin free themselves...
The slugcat watches.
What utter nonense are you spouting now? What on Earth is a slugcat?
You don't even know what a cat is.
I do but your high ass is just making words up at this point, you really are strange.
Thanks Andrew.
My name's not Andrew-who the fuck let you on board?!
Do you need some Haloperidol? You're freaking everyone out with your weird sayings.
You'll never understand what I have seen.
I have no idea how you've managed to stay on this sub for so long, you're concerning me.
Take your meds Sleepy Joe stop thinking about whatever the hell a slugcat is.
It's coming for you.
The only thing coming for me is security wanting to know why I'm talking to you.
Thanks Andrew.
Whatever Richard, go stroke your name's sake.
Does anyone else find it weird how the Separatists use the G3 and G36? Given both those guns don't even use their standard issue cartridges.
You sure? The Separatists have been using .308 for some time now and I doubt they're not making it themselves.
Eh, I suppose but what about the G36? it's in 5.56x45 yet their standard intermediate cartridge is 5.45x39.
My best guess is it's for accuracy reasons, their 5.45 is pretty lackluster for it, you'd also think with it's longer bullet it'd yaw more and do more damage.
To be frank in my opinion I think velocity, temporary cavitation and frag are the bigger damagers than the bullet yawing, just my take though.
Yawing causes the bullet to increase it's surface area and dump all it's energy into where you need it to be so... I'll not lie that's kind of a mid take.
All 3 of those are why bullets are capable of killing someone quite efficiently.
I'm not entirely sure given it's the AK's barrels that are the primary issue, 5.45x39 is decent out of a well made barrel.
To be honest I don't know why they don't just use 5.56, it'd make logistics for them a hell of a lot easier.
It's because the ammo's a lot cheaper to produce, they evidently use less powder and shittier materials so that might be way it's kinda crap.
I remember being on duty on another sub and we confiscated some AKs and some ammo for it from one of the engies.
Turns out he was an insider and was planning to kill the captain, the ammo would've definitely worked but it was steel cased and the powder pretty lackluster deflag wise.
I wish something like that'd happen here, half of the time I'm bored as hell.
Trust me I'd rather be bored there's no end to the nightmares that can happen.
There's a lot of weapons on the market nowadays isn't there?
Tell me about it, there's guns everywhere, I'm kinda concerned both the Coalition and Separatists are planning something... really big.
The Coalition used to heavily restrict firearms yet everyone is now allowed automatic weapons and pistols are handed out like food, it's madness.
Yeah I'm... concerned, at no point in Europan history has there been this many weapons, a heavily armed Europa is a dangerous Europa...
You seen how the crawler and mudraptor populations have completely shrunk? I really blame the gun proliferation for it, this is actively causing moon-wide issues.
Won't be long before they go the way of the mantis.
Fragmentation, bullets, Preso Latex, Devil's Blood, Radiation... the stuff that kills on Europa never fails to continue expanding...
How in the hell did things get this bad?
I couldn't tell you I'll be honest, looks like we're just inventing new and improved ways to kill each other.
I don't understand the chemical weapons usage at all.
To be used as a terror weapon of course, I've heard talk of the Coalition beginning to look into ways of restricting manufacturing of it.
Though, knowing the Coalition they'll turn a blind eye because they want such weapons for... dealing with less than desirable individuals.
Don't forget the furries, never forget about the furries.
I'm sorry the what now? Is this meant to be some sort of weird inside joke I'm too sane to understand?
I think people already know what I'm on about.
I didn't realise this was some weird secret only I'm not allowed to know about-you know what nevermind...
I miss the times when firearms weren't everywhere, I really don't feel safe when even your local junkie has a handgun hidden in his pocket.
Because everyone's gone mad with weapons, I bet you right now the Coalition and Separatists are planning to wage a total war against each other.
Yeah the past 2 or so years have been really rough when it comes to their relations, it's just a matter of what'll break the thresher's back.
I'd say we don't fall behind, I don't want to be that one person who isn't armed and I need a gun, can we get some means of weapon and ammo production on this sub?
What can I say? More guns equals more security all around.
Not when said security is in the hands of a maniac... You know the opiate problem on Europa and arming almost everyone I think is a horrible idea.
I think the EC and Separatists have more to worry about than some random junkies trying to rob people, which mostly goes down horribly for them anyways.
As much as I understand where you're coming from, from a security standpoint, especially with the crap going on right now both sides are clearly getting ready for war.
They're making sure they cover all their bases, including arming civilians.
I think that's a horrible idea, giving every man, woman and child their own firearm seems incredibly uneccessary and dangerous.
Then run your own campaign rallying against it, I'm sure that'll go down well for you.
I don't like beaurocracies...
Just a quick question for any of you, should we try and get one of those fancy prototype sub weapons installed? Like that really snazzy looking Heavy Coilgun?
Those things are damn expensive, I'm not sure we can do that right now, besides they're a different calibre to our existing Coilguns.
What about just the normal Proto Coilgun?
That thing apparently eats through power and ammunition, I'm not sure it's the best investment.
It was just an idea.
Hell no that's way too expensive we sure can't do that right now.
Just an idea bro, might help if we find ourselves against an enemy sub.
It might but that won't matter if we get nuked.
I guess that's a fair point but that's kind of the captain's responsibility to not let that happen.
Oh for fucks sakes who's moved the armour vests again? This is the third damn time someone's shuffled all the stuff around.
Goddamnit really? We kinda need those.
I hope to Jove not, we need them in case shit goes south and we get boarded.
Like with everything on this submarine it's disorganised as hell, we really need to start sorting this stuff out better.
I'd do that if there was any reason to but y'all partially renovate this submarine everytime we dock.
Looks like the submarine fairy's been moving shit again.
At this point it wouldn't surprise me if that's true anymore, the past few days have been wacky as hell.
Tell me about it, I've heard some strange stories about the Alien ruins and they freak the hell out of me.
Plenty more strange stories to come, I can tell you that right now.
Any of you heard about the Brunhes Lineavirus?
Yes I have, I took a course involving all the documented virus species on Europa, mainly from the wildlife.
Needless to say if I catch any of you assholes trying to synthesize any bio-weapons I will kill you myself.
I'm gonna be honest I wouldn't even know where to start with that.
Please keep it that way, I don't want any atrocies on this submarine.
The hell kind of name is that? Sounds like some really shitty movie.
I don't speak... Latin? I'm sure that's the language.
Uh, kind of a weird segway but alright.
My point still stands that's a really weird name.
Very insightful dude...
I have but I'm not qualified enough to talk about it, all I know is it's a virus.
A virus that, makes the skin turn vivid green, I have no idea how that works.
And causes both your lungs and stomach to slough out of your body.
Eugh... Thank you for that mental image.
You're welcome, maybe we should start stocking up on CBRN gear.
I got some abnormally high radiation levels when we passed over a cave not too long ago, no idea what that was about.
You sure that's not just the reactor?
I think i'd fucking know about it if it was the reactor.
I dunno, knowing you.
You're such an asshole, thanks for messing up the conversation.
Fuck me dude stop taking everything so seriously.
Interesting, got any ideas on what it might be?
No but my best guess is it might've been a massive pile of jetissoned depleted rods or...
One of those incredibly strange artefacts that have only been recently discovered, I think the eggheads named it the 'Strahlung Artefact' or something like that I don't really remember.
Alright, keep me informed if you see another spike again.
Aye Aye.
Best guess from my view is it's likely just a hardware fault or someone's fired a fission shell semi-recently.
What were the radiation levels?
About 30 sieverts an hour, really damn high.
The fuck? Uh.. I dunno what the hell that would be then, if it was that strong from that distance who knows what's radiating that.
We'll have to bring this up on one of the research stations later, they might have an answer or two, keep those readings on hand.
Will do.
I picked up something similar a few days back, though something was emitting some really freaky radio waves instead.
I shit you not I converted it into audio and it was the freakiest thing I've ever heard.
You're telling me you detected a Psionic artefact and never told us?
I'm gonna be honest do you really want something like that on board? I'll keep my CNS thanks.
Psi-Radiation is no joke man, apparently it kills pretty quickly and can leave you messed up for life if you manage to survive.
Yeah on second thought it's probably best we didn't find it.
Probably something ruin related, you already know how weird this place can be.
Still something I want to keep tabs on, stuff like this doesn't just happen for the sake of it.
You heard about the freaky shit that's being found inside those ruins? Pretty wild.
I have but I don't believe half of them, I don't think you should either.
Sometimes the best stories aren't as real as everyone thinks.
When are we gonna get the big guns to play around with? I wouldn't mind myself a ShAK-12.
I really don't think we need that amount of firepower, nevermind how expensive those things are to maintain.
As if it wouldn't hurt to have one ready for a station in case shit goes south, we can't raid a station with the most basic equipment...
It wouldn't but I seriously doubt that's a priority right now.
Chief I'm 100% aware of the disparity of weapons right now, I'll find a way to get it sorted at some point, okay?
Aye Aye.
Sorry dude but those guns are really expensive to get ammo for and I don't exactly have the materials to spare for it I'm afraid.
I didn't say it needs to be done now, just something to think about.
Ask the captain if we can get a decent shipment of ammo components, I might be able to fab one up and some ammo if we can make it worth the time.
Alright then.
I'd rather have an MX or a SCAR, I think the ShAK's a bit much cost wise for what we need right now.
6.5 and 7.62 can only get you so far though, be real, 12.7x55 is gonna rock someone's world hard.
Won't mean shit if you don't get good shot placement.
I suppose that's fair but I still want one for the show-off factor.
Then get a Desert Eagle, that thing is the definition of a show-off.
Eh I suppose, .50 AE is semi-decent for the creatures down here.
Man I really want one of the Vanguard's helmets as a war trophy.
Damn same here, that would look fire in my quarters.
It'd also be a pretty good piece of kit for offensive tactics, it's made of the finest stuff you can make a helmet out of.
Well let's go find one then, I'm all in on getting one too.
I can tell you right now that just isn't happening, you are aware of just how dangerous they are right?
That's just gonna make it all the more rewarding.
They'll steamroll over us and take over the submarine dude.
Do you really have that little confidence in us?
You're security I'd expect you to know a thing or two about who we might be fighting.
I do but I'm not as pessimistic as you.
Can't wait to get my hands on an Infiltrator and steal their helmet, that'd look nice as a souveneir.
Something tells me that's gonna be easier said than done.
Nah it shouldn't be too hard we have the kit for it.
I'm not so sure about that, you do know what you're going up against right? Those people aren't exactly ragtag scavs in some rundown outpost.
Dude I'm security my whole job is around fighting people that's what I got in this for, I'm not gonna let the idea of fighting someone scare me.
That's an... interesting way to view your job but different strokes for different folks I guess.
I don't really like the animal look to be honest with you.
To be fair I have no idea why they make their helmets like that, same with the Vanguards.
My best guess is the Wolf resembles power and aggression and the Cat resembles stealth and agility.
I suppose they have their own reasons for it.
I still want one though.
Hey crew just a heads up I got from the last station, apparently there's a lot of freaky artefacts being detected that no one's ever seen before.
Was that from the researchers or was that just some random bozo you met next to a bin?
Fuck me I try and tell you all anything and you shoot me down in a second.
We've been here for Jove knows how long, at least a few hundred years there's no way they're just making new discoveries.
Okay and? The people from Earth were finding all sorts tens of thousands of years after whoever left their stuff behind was still kicking.
Just, lay off the Opium dude it's not healthy.
As if Europa couldn't get any weirder...
Got any more info aside from just 'a lot of freaky artefacts'?
I do, they radiate off this weird energy that causes people to go mad, though why that's only happening recently is beyond me.
This sounds extremely weird but apparently they've found a piece of paper, with a drawing of a cat thing on it.
A damn picture of a weird cat in a ruin that's been sealed of for hundreds-no, maybe THOUSANDS of years! The fuck is going on anymore?!
Alright chill I don't think it goes that deep, probably just a diver freaking out over a piece of weird rock.
That's what I thought until the top scientists at an outpost were given it, did you not hear about the fiasco on Balrock?
That's what all that hysterical crap was about on the event board? Wow...
Don't forget about that cursed mask legend.
There's no evidence for that so I don't really buy into it.
Alright quick question for all of you, what's your favourite kind of firearm?
I'd say something light and compact like an SMG so I can carry that alongside a bunch of equipment.
I'm kinda torn on maybe ARs or BRs, they're both good for general use, BRs dare I say even more so given their power.
I'm more on the shotgun side, get a KSG, load one tube with slugs, the other Magnum Buckshot and you'll be laughing.
I guess I don't really have a preference, whatever gets the job done best I suppose.
I'm not really a gun guy I'll not lie, my job kinda has more to it than just shoot things.
Dude your qualifications required you to have a decent understanding of firearms do you know where you are?
Yeah thanks but not everyone needs to be a fucking gun nerd.
Any of you remember that accident last week in one of the mines? Where 3 miners were sucked into a metal tube and left to drown?
Jesus fucking christ why the fuck did you have to remind me of that? I couldn't sleep for days after hearing about that...
Just reminding you all that the Coalition's safety standards are wack... that could've been avoided if the area was marked as under maintenance.
I'd rather be shot to death, or at the very least die instantly from the horrific pressures outside.
I think we should just stop talking about this you're making me anxious as hell...
I do, what a crap way to go...
There's worse ways.
Is there? being completely unable to move whilst your blood turns to acid and forcing ice cold water into your lungs with no way of escape, with 2 other people? I think that's at least top 5 jesus...
I didn't need that mental image in my head...
I rest my case then, I'll get shot any day over going out like that.
Ah, tick tick tock. Is that a geiger counter or my life-span ticking down? It's Both!
Jesus I'm feeling really sick... I'm sterile for sure...
I feel like I'm about to have a seizure, my entire head feels like it's going to explode.
Jove almighty these radiation levels are insane. Cap' you better get our asses moving now.
I really hope I have enough Anti-Rad after this, lord knows you'll all need it.
Got myself a new AK today, kinda cost a pretty penny though.
To think that ancient ass design is still liberating places, humanity never changes.
I hope that ASh-12 we managed to grab still works, those things are a bitch to get ahold of.
Yeah our Malyuks are kind of a shitty alternative, the fire rate makes it so hard to control.
How did things get this fucked anyways?
Come on! It's hardly like it's a surprise! Europa's been in the shitter ever since Earth stopped talking, now we're on our own and now the Coalition is going mad for power.
Infiltrators scare me.
I'd keep your voice down, I doubt you'd want to start throwing that name around.
By Jove I'm bored, it's all this being stuck inside a metal tube all day and night, really fucks with me.
What i'd do for that Battle Rifle I got my eyes on not too long ago...
Jeez I've got a weird headache, Doc can you come over here?
Eugh, I really don't feel right, my head is spinning...
Fucking hell where has this migraine come from? I feel awful.
Fucks sake I can't concentrate on anything, Doc the hell is going on with me?
This is... the worst headache I've ever experienced...
AAAGH WHAT THE FUCK WAS THAT?!
M-my f-fingers wont sit still.
Someone help me I feel really sick and I can't see shit...
idi kamne...
help... me...
Why have you left us? Oh Monolith...
someone... i-i can't stop shaking...
someone... shoot me...
i can't... feel my arms, or legs...
i... cant see...
I nezabarom nastane den, zasyaye Monolit..
HOW DID THIS GO FROM O TO 100 IN A MATTER OF SECONDS?!
Fuck me guys can you start doing your fucking jobs?! We wouldn't be in this mess if it weren't for all of you lacking!
You lot come on RED ALERT we gotta put our shit on overdrive!
This has not gonna last written all over it!
This is BAD BAD BAD!
